page.title: 19Day in the life of a Family
page.content: A family of 4 living in Cardross -Mother,Father,daughter,13,and son,10. 07:00 Family get up and have breakfast 08:10 Father leaves for work in Bishopbriggs. 08:35 Mother takes children to school in Helensburgh. 09:00_13:00 Mother shops;returns home and does housework. 13:00_15:15 Mother has lunch and visits sick friend. 15:30 Children collected from school. 16:15 Children do homework and watch television. 18:00 Son has early meal;goes to cubs. 19:00 Father returns home;rest of family have a meal. 20:00 Son returns from cubs;goes to bed. 21:00 Daughter goes to bed;parents watch the evening news. 22:00 Parents have supper;go to bed.
